mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM review WHERE restr_NUM = #{restr_NUM}
SELECT * FROM review WHERE restr_NUM = #{restr_NUM} ORDER BY review_regdate DESC, review_NUM DESC
SELECT * FROM review WHERE user_email = #{user_email} ORDER BY review_regdate DESC, review_NUM DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (restr_NUM, user_email, user_name, user_picture, review_comment, review_picture, review_star, review_regdate, review_update) VALUES (#{restr_NUM}, #{user_email}, #{user_name},#{user_picture}, #{review_comment}, #{review_picture}, ${review_star}, now(), now())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM review WHERE review_NUM = #{review_NUM} AND user_email = #{user_email}
